contest-event.event-date:
Nov. 15, 2003 D SEWBBA (Treorchy) Contest (Championship Section)
SEWBBA (Treorchy) Contest (Championship Section) 1 Own Choice Test Piece Contest SEWBBA (Treorchy) Contest sewbba-treorchy-contest-championship-section
Set Test and Entertainments Contest
Festival Music
Parc & Dare Theatre, Treorchy, Rhondda Cynon Taf, Wales, UK Best instrumentalist - euphonium Tongwynlais. Best trombone - Burry Port. Prizes - 1st £150, 2nd £90, 3rd £60. 5 bands competed.
Jan. 4, 2010, 9:45 p.m. July 2, 2020, 12:04 p.m.
1 Tongwynlais Temperance Band C. Brian Buckley
2 Burry Port Town Ceri Thomas
3 Parc and Dare Band Craig Roberts
4 Thomas Coaches Mid Rhondda Band Alan Gibbs
5 Treherbert & District Band Graham Sheppard
